atk-s0403a38:0_0: As far as the mark of lustful couples,
atk-s0403a38:1_0: Then he taught the five kinds of sensual stimulation to remain.
atk-s0403a38:2_0: The VisÄkha are running errands and messages for the Nuns
atk-s0403a38:3_0: The Book of the Sixes is finished.
atk-s0403a38:4_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
